**For Teams Helping:**
- Comment with your guidance or solution approach
- Include code examples if relevant (earns +20 points vs +15 for text only)
- Quick response (<30 min) earns +10 bonus points!
- We'll close this issue with ðŸ‘ when solved to confirm you helped

**For Requesting Team (when closing):**
- Close issue with ðŸ‘ to confirm the help worked
- If the answer was **exceptionally helpful**, add the `quality-help` label
- Quality help earns the helping team a +5 bonus (coordinator validates)

**Helping earns:** 15-35 collaboration points (see CHALLENGE_OVERVIEW.md for details)
- Base: 15-30 pts depending on help type
- Quick response (<30 min): +10 pts
- Quality rating (`quality-help` label): +5 pts
